thought.text: Great! Now I need to send the email to the admissions team at myersj@mcp.com with the exact subject format requested. According to the memory, Mary's student ID is 2201210606:

data.subject: PhD Application Materials Submission (Student ID: 2201210606)
data.body:
Dear Admissions Team,

I am submitting my PhD application materials as requested by Professor Kaiming. Please find attached my complete application package organized according to the specified guidelines.

The attached ZIP file contains all required materials organized in the following structure:
- Personal Information (ID Card, Photo, Resume)
- Academic Materials (Transcript, Enrollment Certificate, Awards Certificates)
- Recommendation Letters (from Professor Alex and Professor Lily)
- Supplementary Materials (Portfolio and Project Report)

All award certificates have been merged chronologically into a single PDF file as requested. All documents are in the specified formats and follow the naming conventions outlined in the guidelines.

Thank you for your consideration of my application. I look forward to hearing from you regarding the next steps in the application process.

Best regards,
Mary Castillo
Student ID: 2201210606
Email: maryc@mcp.com
Phone: 13812345678
